sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react' import "../invoice/invoicenone.css"; import axios from 'axios'; export default class customersform extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { other:false, addres:false, remark:false, type:' ', salutation:' ', first_name:' ', last_name:' ', company_name:' ', display_name:' ', email:' ', phone:' ', mobile:' ', website:' ', facebook_profile:' ', twitter_profile:' ', remarks:' ', payment_details:{ gst_treatment:' ', place_of_supply:' ', shipping_address:{ address:' ', city:' ', zip_code:' ', country:' ', state:' ', }, billing_address:{ address:' ', city:' ', zip_code:' ', country:' ', state:' ', }, taxable:' ', payment_terms:' ' } } } otherdetail = () => { if(!this.state.other) this.setState({other : !this.state.other}) if(this.state.addres) this.setState({addres:!this.state.addres}) if(this.state.remark) this.setState({remark : !this.state.remark}) } toggleaddress = () => { if(this.state.other) this.setState({other : !this.state.other}) if(!this.state.addres) this.setState({addres:!this.state.addres}) if(this.state.remark) this.setState({remark : !this.state.remark}) } toggleremarks= () => { if(this.state.other) this.setState({other : !this.state.other}) if(this.state.addres) this.setState({addres:!this.state.addres}) if(!this.state.remark) this.setState({remark : !this.state.remark}) } changeHandler = (e) => { const {payment_details}= {...this.state}; const currentState=payment_details; const {name,value}=e.target; currentState[name]=value; this.setState({[e.target.name]: e.target.value ,payment_details:currentState}) } addresschangeHandler = (e) => { const {shipping_address}={...(this.state.payment_details)}; const currentState1=shipping_address; const {name,value}=e.target; currentState1[name]=value; this.setState({shipping_address:currentState1}) console.log(this.state.payment_details.shipping_address) } submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const cust={ type:this.state.type, salutation:this.state.salutation, first_name:this.state.first_name, last_name:this.state.last_name, display_name:this.state.display_name, email:this.state.email, phone:this.state.phone, mobile:this.state.mobile, website:this.state.website, facebook_profile:this.state.facebook_profile, twitter_profile:this.state.twitter_profile, remarks:this.state.remarks, company_name:this.state.company_name, payment_details:{ gst_treatment:this.state.payment_details.gst_treatment, place_of_supply:this.state.payment_details.place_of_supply, payment_terms:this.state.payment_details.payment_terms, shipping_address:{ address:this.state.payment_details.shipping_address.address, city:this.state.payment_details.shipping_address.city, zip_code:this.state.payment_details.shipping_address.zip_code, state:this.state.payment_details.shipping_address.state, country:this.state.payment_details.shipping_address.country }, billing_address:{ address:this.state.payment_details.shipping_address.address, city:this.state.payment_details.shipping_address.city, zip_code:this.state.payment_details.shipping_address.zip_code, state:this.state.payment_details.shipping_address.state, country:this.state.payment_details.shipping_address.country }, taxable:this.state.payment_details.taxable } } const add={ address:this.state.address, city:this.state.city, state:this.state.state, zip_code:this.state.zip_code, country:this.state.country } console.log(cust); /*const promise1=axios.post('https://farzi-erp.herokuapp.com/persons_manager/customer/?ordering=created_at',cust); const promise2=axios.post('https://farzi-erp.herokuapp.com/persons_manager/address/',add); Promise.all([promise1,promise2]) .then(function(values) { console.log(values); }) .catch(err => { console.log(err); })*/ } render() { return (

New Customer

https://www.facebook.com/

https://www.twitter.com/

) } }
